titleStmt.title: The information of Edward Turbervill of Skerr in the county of Glamorgan, Gent Delivered at the bar of the House of Commons, Tuesday the ninth day of November, 1680. Perused and signed to be printed, according to the order of the House of Commons, by me William Williams, speaker.
titleStmt.author: Turberville, Edward, 1648?-1681.
Williams, William, b. 1613.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication from Wing CD-ROM, 1996.
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries, London, England.
Wing CD-ROM, 1996 calls this a broadsheet.
